title:
Subgraphs with a positive minimum semidegree in digraphs with large
  outdegree
authors: Andrzej Grzesik, Vojtech Rodl, Jan Volec
abstract:
We prove that every $n$-vertex directed graph $G$ with the minimum outdegree
$\delta^+(G) = d$ contains a subgraph $H$ satisfying \[ \min\left\{\delta^+(H),
\delta^-(H) \right\} \ge \frac{d(d+1)}{2n} \,.\] We also show that if $d =
o(n)$ then this bound is asymptotically best possible.
